channel.title: Best Computer. Cheapest Price
channel.description: Well im looking at gettign a laptop so i can muck around when we go on massive road trips to nowhere. Im going to get one bottem of the line. When i say bottem i mean rock bottem. I just need it to run scar maybe a few games. iunno. But what is the best computer at the cheapes price. I mean like bottem of the line but still able to run scar effieciently and all that.

item.title: Best Computer. Cheapest Price
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

i just built my pc myself, i started from a really cheapass, slow pc with this as specs:

asrock 741gx mobo
amd sempron 2200+
256 mb of ram
80 gig hdd
onboard sound/vga

and some other shit from my old pc.

now, my pc looks like this:

asrock 939dualsata2
amd 64 bits 3200+ OC'ed @ 2250 mhz
nvidia 6600gt
786 mb ram (gonna upgrade as soon as i get more money :P)
240 gb hdd
new dvd drive

but it'll cost you some time to get above type of specs, took me about 14 months!

Read full topic

item.title: Best Computer. Cheapest Price
item.dc:creator: @Pyro Pyro
item.description:
@Pyro wrote:

My god VG. Thats a bit too good for me i think. Plus you must know that i am a poor person lol. I am a student workign afterschools to gather money in. Getting 700 Us is like 1400NZ which would take me about 20-30 weeks to save up.

Read full topic

please dont get a Dell

but I got mine from tigerdirect.com its cheap and good

item.title: Best Computer. Cheapest Price
item.dc:creator: @VG_Kobra VG_Kobra
item.description:
@VG_Kobra wrote:

My new computer is a laptop

I have a HP Pavilion Laptop, It has the new 64 bit processor. With ATI Radeon X200 Mobile Technology forgot the processor speed and it has 256 DDR Shared Ram. DVD Burner. WiFi Card ( Hooray Free Internet :D)Comes with complete software pack and few extras and all the other hardware including charger pack for around 700 $ American. You can buy it at HP I think.

P.S I was also eager to use the Laptop when I was bored on road trips it turns out that usage of the Laptop in Cars may damage the LCD Screen. So it isn't advisable.

Read full topic

item.title: Best Computer. Cheapest Price

item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Dell inspiration 1300's are cheap(you can get 40mb memory and 512 mb ram for around $299 or $499) depending on where you look.
